text: I don't know if there's ever been a
piece of fashion that inspires so much
division and emotional turmoil the term
make America great again is was not a
new slogan when we'll welcome them into
a great national crusade to make America
great again I believe that together we
can make America great again Donald
Trump went and had a trademark put on
that phrase the day following the 2012
election when Mitt Romney lost to Barack
Obama the very next day the hat idea was
mr. Trump's idea and again he liked to
wear hats when he golfed and when the
make America great again slogan came
into fruition he want to see it on a hat
and originally it was going to be just
for him to wear while he was out golfing
it's emotional its simple and clear to
understand and it's participatory
however you feel about Donald Trump he's
a master salesman and it's a credit to
the mega hat that it is as divisive as
it is arguably a lot of trumps tactics
and trumpism in the United States is
about dividing people to sell a message
and the hat has been the symbol of of
achieving that it provides hope to some
and for others it represents hatred and
anger to me it shows strength and
leadership something that we've not
always had when I look around and see
other people with their mega hats on it
makes me proud that they are supporting
our country supporting our president for
me it's become a symbol of polarization
and separation no matter what the
intentions were this idea of America in
the 1950s where people a certain group
were privileged and others were not
bringing us back to a time when America
was historically great was not great for
people who look like me and people who
are minorities
